root: ^After walking for some more times, the desolation gave way to a faint glimmer.
^A towering beacon emerged in the distance—beacon is a transportation device that could bring the Dr. Hyde to another world.
^Making the researcher one step closer with the final destination.
^"This beacon...should allow me to travel to another realm... finally, one step closer to my destination."
^As Dr. Hyde took a step, the world is spinning as the surrounding turns pitch black.
